howItWorksPage.title: How It
howItWorksPage.subtitle: Transform your expertise into a digital journey in three simple steps
howItWorksPage.step1Desc: Share your existing documents, recordings, or notes. Our AI understands your unique methodology and transforms it into structured content.
howItWorksPage.step2Desc: Watch as AI transforms your content into a structured 3 or 7-day transformational experience with daily goals, exercises, and personalized guidance.
howItWorksPage.step3Desc: Get a beautiful, ready-to-share landing page for your Flow. Participants can purchase and start their journey immediately. Both the site and the entire experience are fully mobile-friendly.
howItWorksPage.step4Desc: Connect your own payment link and you're set. When clients purchase your journey, the payment goes directly to you — no middlemen, no commission, no waiting. You own your business, we just power it.
howItWorksPage.step5Desc: Publish your journey with a shareable link. Participants experience your wisdom through an AI-powered chat that speaks in your voice.

pricingPage.title: Choose the plan that turns your
pricingPage.subtitle: Three levels - start, grow, and scale.
pricingPage.subtitleDetails: All plans include a personal sales landing page, payment integration (funds go directly to you), cloud hosting, and a mentor dashboard.
pricingPage.starterDesc: The simplest, fastest, and most affordable way to launch your first journey and start selling online - without a website, without tech skills, and without risk.
pricingPage.proDesc: For mentors who are already selling and want to grow - with more journeys, more clients, and deeper performance visibility.
pricingPage.businessDesc: For established mentors and growing schools who want to offer multiple journeys at scale — with bigger audiences, more products, and true long-term revenue.
pricingPage.starterBestFor: Mentors who want to start fast, learn the platform, and make their first sales.
pricingPage.proBestFor: Mentors ready to scale their business into consistent monthly revenue.
pricingPage.businessBestFor: Mentors and organizations who are ready to scale multiple journeys, build a product portfolio, and earn consistently at volume.
pricingPage.featureSalesPageEach: Personal sales landing page for each journey
pricingPage.featureDirectPayment: Direct payment integration (money goes to you)
pricingPage.faq1Q: How does the 21-day free trial work?
pricingPage.faq1A: Create your first Flow and get 21 full days to explore the platform. Build your journey, preview everything risk-free. After 21 days, subscribe to continue using all features. No credit card required to start.
pricingPage.faq2Q: What happens if I exceed my user limit?
pricingPage.faq2A: If you go over your included users, you'll be charged $0.60 per additional user. Usage is calculated monthly and added to your next invoice.
pricingPage.faq3Q: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
pricingPage.faq3A: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll get immediate access to new features. When downgrading, changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
pricingPage.faq4Q: How do payments work? Do you take a percentage?
pricingPage.faq4A: No, we never take a percentage of your earnings. Payments from your participants go directly to your connected Stripe account. You keep 100% of what you earn (minus standard Stripe processing fees).
pricingPage.faq5A: A user is anyone who actively participates in your journey. This includes anyone who signs up and engages with your flow content, whether they paid or accessed it for free.
pricingPage.faq6A: Yes, you can cancel anytime. Your access continues until the end of your current billing period. There are no cancellation fees or long-term commitments.
pricingPage.revenue100Desc: We don't take percentages, we don't touch your income, and we don't interfere with your client relationships.
pricingPage.readyToBeginDesc: Your first journey can be live today. AI builds the process, the site goes live, and payments flow directly to you.

heroSubtitle: Create personalized, daily transformational experiences for your clients
featureAIDesc: Personalized daily guidance that adapts to each participant
featurePaymentsDesc: Accept payments through your preferred provider
heroDescription:
Flow83 empowers teachers, mentors, and therapists to turn their methods into AI-powered personal development journeys, guided by their unique voice and way of working.
Journeys that feel personal, even when hundreds experience them at once.
whyFlow83Desc: Everything you need to transform your expertise into a scalable digital business.
featureAICreationDesc: Save hours of work with automatic journey generation from your existing content.
featureReachMoreDesc: Scale from 1:1 sessions to dozens or hundreds of clients simultaneously.
featureYourMoneyDesc: Connect your own payment link and get paid instantly. Your clients, your brand, your earnings — we never take a cut.
featureProfessionalDesc: Beautiful, designed pages without needing a designer or developer.
featureTrackProgressDesc: Monitor every participant's journey and engagement in real-time.
featureFullControlDesc: Edit and adjust at any moment, with no tech dependencies.
joinThousands: Join thousands of coaches, therapists, and healers who are scaling their impact
ctaDescription: Start creating transformational digital journeys that will touch lives and create lasting impact.
turnMethodIntoFlow: Turn Your Method Into a Flow
footerDescription: Create personalized digital journeys that transform lives through wisdom and AI.
